title: Remove “Find People” from authenticated header navigation

requirements.summary: Remove the "Find People" navigation item from the authenticated desktop header button group and mobile slide-out menu, without affecting the /directory route.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in on desktop widths, the top header navigation no longer shows a button labeled "Find People".
When signed in on mobile widths, the slide-out menu no longer shows an item labeled "Find People".
No other navigation items (Feed, My Profile, Requests, Notifications, Settings) are removed or renamed.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Remove the desktop and mobile navigation UI entries that link to the directory and are labeled "Find People". Also remove any now-unused related icon imports (e.g., Users from lucide-react) to keep the header component clean, while leaving all other nav items unchanged and keeping the /directory route intact.
